titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Cohedur RL.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/5/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2009, the duty on Mixtures of resorcinal, hexamethylolmelamine ether (Cohedur RL).
